Description: reading lists of regular, irregular and pseudowords taken from the ECLA16+ and EVALEC tests

regular1_r1_evalec_acc.description: accuracy evalec regular words list 1. R1: each letter corresponds to one phoneme.

regular2_r2_evalec_acc.description: accuracy evalec regular words list 2. R2: items containing a digraph (ch, ou, on-an-in)

regular3_r3_evalec_acc.description: accuracy evalec regular words list 3. R3: items containing a contextual grapheme (c?g, a + i + ll)

irregular1_r4_evalec_acc.description: accuracy evalec irregular words list 1. R4: items containing at least one grapheme with an exceptional pronunciation (x, sc)

irregular2_lexlength_evalec_acc.description: accuracy evalec irregular words list 2 lexlength (lexicality and length test) i.e. 10 long and 10 short items

pseudo1_r1_evalec_acc.description: accuracy pseudowords evalec list 1. R1: each letter corresponds to one phoneme.

pseudo2_r2_evalec_acc.description: accuracy pseudowords evalec list 2. R2: items containing a digraph (ch, ou, on-an-in)

pseudo3_r3_evalec_acc.description: accuracy pseudowords evalec list 3. R3: items containing a contextual grapheme (c?g, a + i + ll)

regular1_r1_evalec_rt.description: reaction time evalec regular words list 1. R1: each letter corresponds to one phoneme.

regular2_r2_evalec_rt.description: reaction time evalec regular words list 2. R2: items containing a digraph (ch, ou, on-an-in)

regular3_r3_evalec_rt.description: reaction time evalec regular words list 3. R3: items containing a contextual grapheme (c?g, a + i + ll)

regular4_ecla16_rt.description: reaction time ecla16 regular words list 4

irregular1_r4_evalec_rt.description: reaction time evalec irregular words list 1. R4: items containing at least one grapheme with an exceptional pronunciation (x, sc)

irregular2_lexlength_evalec_rt.description: reaction time evalec irregular words list 2 lexlength (lexicality and length test) i.e. 10 long and 10 short items

irregular3_ecla16_rt.description: reaction time ecla16t irregular words list 3

pseudo1_r1_evalec_rt.description: reaction time pseudowords evalec list 1. R1: each letter corresponds to one phoneme.

pseudo2_r2_evalec_rt.description: reaction time pseudowords evalec list 2. R2: items containing a digraph (ch, ou, on-an-in)

pseudo3_r3_evalec_rt.description: reaction time pseudowords evalec list 3. R3: items containing a contextual grapheme (c?g, a + i + ll)

regular_rt.description: average reaction time all regular words

irregular_rt.description: average reaction time all irregular words
